directions: In a bowl toss together the radishes, the cabbage, the carrots, the onion, the lemon juice, the sugar, the oil, the coriander, and salt and pepper to taste.
ingredients: 1/2 pound radishes, trimmed and grated coarse (about 2 cups)
2 tablespoons finely chopped fresh coriander, mint, or parsley leaves
title: Radish Slaw
